metadata.name: Son of a Pig #1
metadata.title: Son of a Pig #1
metadata.description:
The #Dirtypigs signature collection, crafted in the image of its founders, there is a persona for every one of our inner pig!
A limited edition human and A.I. collaboration consisting of 10,000 Son of a Pig only as part of the #Dirtypigs ecosystem.
Purchase benefits:
#1 Earn $PIG crypto dividend on purchase value (1 $PIG : $1 USD) and future $PIG 1% transaction royalties;
#2 Robe Movement - custom clothing for NFT owners with royalty collection from licensing to non-owner sales;
#3 3D versions of 2D avatar;
#4 An Avatar song generated by A.I. from the NFT's DNA;
#5 #Dirtypigs community game with NFT characters import;
#6 $PIG ICO with discounted rates for NFT owners;
#7 Special access membership to deals and future developments).
Partial proceeds will go to organisations fighting inequalities and injustices for child poverty.
